contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Ithaca}} '''[[Ithaca]]''' is an island in Greece. '''Ithaca''' or '''Ithaka''' may also refer to: *[[Ithaka Harbors]], publisher of academic journals in [[JSTOR]] *[[Homer's Ithaca]], Ithaca as featured in Homer's Odyssey *[[1151 Ithaka]], an asteroid *[[Ithaca Chasma]], a valley on Saturn's moon Tethys *[[Ithaca College]], a liberal arts college *[[Ithaca Gun Company]], a US shotgun and rifle manufacturer *[[Ithaca 37]], a shotgun *[[Ithaka Harbors, Inc.]], or [[ITHAKA]] the owner of the [[JSTOR]] journal database *[[Ithaca (ship)]], a shipwreck near the port of Churchill, Manitoba, in Hudson's Bay {{tocright}} == Places == ===Australia=== *[[Ithaca, Queensland]], former local government area, current locality, in Brisbane ===United States=== *[[Ithaca, New York]], a city in New York State **[[Ithaca Tompkins Regional Airport]] **[[Ithaca City School District]], a public school district **[[Ithaca Commons]], a pedestrian mall **[[Ithaca Health Alliance]], a health insurance cooperative **[[Ithaca High School (Ithaca, New York)]], a public secondary school **[[Ithaca Hours]], a local currency system *[[Ithaca, Georgia]] *[[Ithaca, Michigan]], a city in Michigan **[[Ithaca High School (Michigan)]] *[[Ithaca, Nebraska]] *[[Ithaca, Ohio]] *[[Ithaca, Wisconsin]] **[[Ithaca (community), Wisconsin]] == Music == *[[Ithaka (musician)]] *[[Ithaca (album)|''Ithaca'' (album)]], a 2010 album by Paula Cole *"Ithaka", a song by [[Deb Talan]] *"Ithaka", a rock band lead by [[Craig Horner]] == Publications == *''[[The Ithaca Journal]]'', a daily newspaper *''[[Ithaca Community News]]'', an e-mail newsletter == Fiction == *"[[Constantine P. Cavafy#Ithaca|Ithaca]]", a poem by [[Constantine P. Cavafy]] *[[Ithaca (Dune)]], a no-ship in the ''Dune'' fictional universe *Ithaca, the town in California where Saroyan's ''[[The Human Comedy (novel)|The Human Comedy]]'' takes place *Ithaca, the penultimate episode of James Joyce's novel ''[[Ulysses (novel)|Ulysses]]'' *''[[Ithaka'' (novel)|''Ithaka]]'', a young-adult novel by English author [[AdÃ¨le Geras]] {{disambiguation|geo}}
